attributes.action: create a Constitution for the UK today putting people first
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Life is changing beyond recongnition and we need to update all outdated and invalid laws to clarify the current populations rights in a way which applies to the UK residents of today and utmost as a democracy.  It would be interesting to actually put into words the constitution of the United Kingdom in the same way the Americans have done and to put this country back on track with people a priority infront of bureaucracy and loss of identity which is driving people to seek a sense of belonging abroad (and which has alienated the people who work hard and are frustrated by the double standards and back-to-front logic we witness daily)
